name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TabX - Make tab management and use easier!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A amazing chrome extension for manage all tabs.Make tab management and use easier!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to TabX!

Are you struggling to manage the increasing number of tabs in your Chrome browser? Look no further! Download TabX now and effortlessly manage all your Chrome tabs, windows, and groups.

TabX offers a range of efficient features, including quick search, navigation, URL copying, tab closing, and incognito mode switching. Additionally, we support automatic grouping based on domain names and custom tags assigned to pages. With TabX, your Chrome browser will be organized and optimized, greatly enhancing your productivity.

We are constantly developing new features and would love to hear your feedback. Experience the convenience of TabX and help us improve!

Thank you!

欢迎使用 TabX！

标签页越来越多，管理起来真是一件头疼的事情。现在，你可以轻松下载 TabX，它能够帮助你方便地管理你的所有 Chrome 标签页、窗口和分组。

TabX 提供了一系列高效的功能，包括标签页的快速搜索、跳转、复制地址、关闭页面以及切换隐私模式等等。此外，我们还支持按域名进行自动分组，以及根据页面上的自定义标签进行自动分组。使用 TabX，你的 Chrome 浏览器将变得井井有条，大大提高你的工作效率。

我们正在不断开发更多功能，期待你的体验和建议！下载 TabX，让你的标签页管理变得更加轻松便捷。

谢谢！
